busy.role

Interface RoleDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RoleDaoImpl

    public interface RoleDao
    Role persistence interface.
    Author:
    malkomich

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Role> findByUser(User user)
      Gets the list of roles attached to the given user.
      Role findManagerByCompany(Company company)
      Gets the main role (manager) of the given company.
      void save(Role role)
      Persists a new role or update an existing one.

    • Method Detail

      • save

        void save(Role role)
        Persists a new role or update an existing one.
        Parameters:
        role - the role object to be persisted

      • findByUser

        List<Role> findByUser(User user)
        Gets the list of roles attached to the given user.
        Parameters:
        user - user which list of returning roles are attached to
        Returns:
        The list of role objects

      • findManagerByCompany

        Role findManagerByCompany(Company company)
        Gets the main role (manager) of the given company.
        Parameters:
        company - company which role are attached to with manager status
        Returns:
        The resultant role object
